segments.text: Good evening , Pizza House . This is Marty speaking . May I take your order ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Um yes , I'd like a medium pizza with pepperoni , olives , and extra cheese .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have a two-for-one special on large pizzas.Would you like a large pizza instead ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! Would you like your second pizza to be these as the first ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , make the second one with ham , pineappleand green peppers . Oh , and make it thin crust .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , thin crust . Your total is $ 21.50 and yourorder will arrive in thirty minutes or it â€™ s free !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , wait ! ! I need your address !
segments.speaker: S1
